tags: lol sorry i’m sick so i’m kind of over emotional
summary: haha don’t @ me, but sometimes i have a hard time scrolling through the dan and phil tag because i see sad theories of why they...
body:
haha don’t @ me, but sometimes i have a hard time scrolling through the dan and phil tag because i see sad theories of why they are on on hiatus and it makes me disproportionately emotional. to be honest, as much as i want content, i just really hope they are happy ☼

i’ll save my sad boy hours until we hear more. also i think the people in my life are tired of hearing me rant about youtubers, singers, and actors i love, so i’m going to try to not worry about it too much.

blog.name: ahhimgay
blog.title: pancake! at the disco
blog.description:
just your average emo trash can

•broke artist•

body:
hiatus

i just want to say one thing. i see that everyone is saying how it’s disrespectful that dan and phil are keeping us in the dark, and i agree with that. but dan and phil aren’t stupid, they’re very intelligent people. dan has admit in the past that he spends way too much time on tumblr, and probably has visit the dnp tag. so he’s probably seen our complaints. and while phils still active with youtube and still isn’t telling us anything, he probably knows too. i’m sure they’re doing that for a reason. dan and phil care greatly for their fans, they wouldn’t purposely keep us in the dark. i feel that they’re doing something big and that’s why they aren’t telling us anything. another topic i’ve seen is that phil/dnp is making memberships and merch still, basically asking us for money with nothing in return. yes that may be rude but i feel that’s their way of telling us they’re not going anywhere, aka quitting youtube. a lot of people are saying they’re not returning to youtube, but if they aren’t then why bother making merch/memberships? idk that’s just my opinion. i also feel that dan’s planning something. idk what it may be, but i feel somethings going to happen. while phil was in florida with his family, dan was seen at a creator convention thing. this may be my phannie who wants content jumping out but idk. anyway i just wanted to voice my opinion about the hiatus. thanks for reading.

summary: I feel like,,  ashamed that I was ever subbed to james. Like all that time how did I not realize? I understand there’s no reason...
question: I feel like,,  ashamed that I was ever subbed to james. Like all that time how did I not realize? I understand there’s no reason for me to be guilty for subbing in the first place, but still,, I feel awful
answer: You shouldn’t feel awful. You just wanted to support someone, but you didn’t know the behind the scenes. It’s alright. It’s totally unfair that people shoved this under the rug for so long. It’s unfair that people were scared of him and couldn’t speak up about it… But you’ll get through it day by day. Sub to channels like good mythical morning or smosh. Jenna Marbles and Julien Solomita are great people. Colleen Ballinger/Miranda Sings is really great and super talented. Shane Dawson is coming out with content soon (I think). Phillip De Franco has weekly news coverage and he’s an all around great guy. Mr Beast is doing wild stuff all the time. Dan and Phil have really good content. I’ve been binging Chris Klemens and transitioning over to Ricky Dillon (I know. It’s such a weird transion. Lol)…There’s so many options out there. If you need suggestions on what/who to watch first please come back and let me know. (If anyone has other suggestions for youtubers or videos please let us know.)

blog.name: ahhhthefeels
blog.title: idek anymore
blog.description: 21 // she/her // US / Kind of brutally honest about what I choose to talk about / Semi-productive member of society by day, Garbage Disposal™ by night,, bitch is also musical aaand I used art made by @eilishpml as my profile pic :)

summary: It's so nice to reminisce on fetus Dan and Phil, even if we didn't know they existed when they met, but like I'm only now...
body: It’s so nice to reminisce on fetus Dan and Phil, even if we didn’t know they existed when they met, but like I’m only now starting to wrap my head around just how long ago they met. 2009 was literally one of the worst years of my life, being constantly terrorized by my sixth grade teacher and not knowing why every kid I met at school either wanted to ignore me or take advantage of me. If only I knew of such a beauty taking form on the other side of the world…
